evidence.claim: United Surgical adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for patient data handling.
The company utilizes HL7 protocol standards to ensure data exchange between their systems and health information exchanges.
United Surgical's technology supports FHIR for interoperability with electronic health records (EHRs).
They engage in EDI transactions based on X12 formats for claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: United Surgical's focus on EHR integration and X12 transactions aligns with ICP criteria.
